titleStmt.title: The breaking of the day of God wherein, four things are manifested : I. That the two witnesses are not in ki[ll]ing, but in rising from death, II. The three dayes and half, or 42. months of the saints captivity under the beast, very near expired, III. Christ hath begun to reign in his saints, and to tread their corrupt flesh under his feet, IIII. Christs dominion over the nations of the world, near the approach / by Gerrard VVinstanley.
titleStmt.author: Winstanley, Gerrard, b. 1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.C. for Giles Calvert ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
